entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snowshower, 0.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: CFB Trenton 5:27 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023
Condition: Light Snowshower
Temperature: 0.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.6 kPa falling
Visibility: 8.1 km
Humidity: 68 %
Dewpoint: -4.5°C
Wind: WSW 41 km/h gust 68 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Flurries at times heavy beginning this evening and ending late this evening. Clearing late this evening. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 this evening. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023
